name: astock-stockthumbs
description: Reference integration of Adobe Stock search results

scripts.build: babel src/sdk_stockthumbs.js --out-file dist/sdk_stockthumbs.min.js --source-maps && babel src --out-dir dist --copy-files && babel src/custom-stockthumbs.js --out-file dist/custom-stockthumbs.min.js --source-maps && rm dist/*src.html && rm dist/*stockthumbs.js && rm -r dist/archive && git archive --format=zip --prefix=stockthumbs/ HEAD:dist/ -o stockthumbs-$npm_package_version.zip

author: cfsmith@adobe.com
